var_value: From the documentation: 'xP3 (Crosslingual Public Pool of Prompts) is a collection of prompts & datasets across 46 of languages & 16 NLP tasks'
Code well documented and actively maintained
Architecture described in preprint, code available in github repo, recipe on HuggingFace
Preprint (updated May 2023) of 9 pages +114 page appendix
